TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1259

barker_notes.barker_summary: Order for corn subscribed to pay salary of Deputy in Congress.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1259

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Order for corn subscribed to pay salary of Deputy in Congress.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Mr McCormick*/person_mentioned* will receive the corn from *person_mentioned*varner*/person_mentioned* that he is to deliver on the Subscrption for the *person_mentioned*Deputy*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Singer*/person_mentioned* informed me that he would deliver 35 bushels out of *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*varner*/person_mentioned*s crib*/location_mentioned*—that is 10 for himself, 10 for *person_mentioned*Johnson*/person_mentioned*, and 15 that he exchanged for below—also *person_mentioned*Kenneday*/person_mentioned* requested me to receive out of his *location_mentioned*crib */location_mentioned*20 bushels for himself— 10 for *person_mentioned*Nelson*/person_mentioned*—and 20 for *person_mentioned*Christman*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*I wish you to secure the corn in the *location_mentioned*cribs */location_mentioned*and leave it in the care of *person_mentioned*Wheat*/person_mentioned* or the *person_mentioned*man*/person_mentioned* who is to live at *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*varner*/person_mentioned*s place.*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="01-21-1826">Jany. 21—1826*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Mr. McCormick*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
